attributes.action: We request that parliament holds a full debate and a free vote on Article 50.
attributes.additional_details:
1. Any Member State may decide to withdraw from the Union in accordance with its own constitutional requirements.

This is the opening statement of Article 50.
attributes.background: It is likely that this referendum result will lead to the breakup of the UK. Parliament must make a decision on our position within the EU and on the possible break-up of the UK.  Enactment of Article 50 by parliament will trigger this process.

rejection.details:
The open petition similar to yours is:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
